tasks.label: Build and copy libs (Android)
tasks.command: swift-android build --swift-sdk aarch64-unknown-linux-android24 && cp .build/debug/libGodotVrTest.so bin && cp .build/debug/libSwiftGodot.so bin

tasks.label: Build and copy libs (macOS)
tasks.command: swift build && cp .build/debug/libGodotVrTest.dylib bin && cp .build/debug/libSwiftGodot.dylib bin

tasks.label: Build, copy libs and restart editor (macOS)
tasks.command: swift build && cp .build/debug/libGodotVrTest.dylib bin && cp .build/debug/libSwiftGodot.dylib bin && pkill -x Godot || true && sleep 0.3 && open -a Godot project.godot
